trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GREETING_CHARLEMEND_000_000<tab>Lest you forget, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, our task is to replenish the infirmary's stores of daily necessities─dining utensils, bedding, and the like. We thank you for your kind assistance.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GREETING_CHARLEMEND_000_001<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. If you have the medical supplies we require, I should be glad to take them off your hands.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GREETING_CHARLEMEND_000_002<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Good evening)) ((Good morrow)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Good day)) ((Good evening)) /var>)) /var> to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. As you will recall, rehabilitation aids such as walking sticks and wheelchairs are the order of the day.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GREETING_CHARLEMEND_000_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we are currently preparing to host a high tea for our patients. Your assistance in the way of supplies would be appreciated.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GREETING_CHARLEMEND_000_004<tab>Welcome, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, welcome. I believe I speak for all at Ser Vaindreau's Grace when I say we are always glad for your visit.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>Make a delivery (<var 20 E803 /var> remaining).
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>Cast glamour on Charlemend.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>Learn about custom deliveries.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TOPMENU_000_004<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>What would you learn more about?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>Satisfaction level.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>Delivery requirements and rewards.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>Procuring collectables.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>Acquiring materials.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>Increasing the value of crafted collectables.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>Increasing the value of gathered collectables.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>Increasing the value of fish.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_001_000<tab>With each successful delivery, Charlemend will come to trust you more and more, leading him to task you with assignments of greater importance.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_001_001<tab>This will be displayed in the form of a gauge atop the Custom Deliveries list. Fill this gauge to the maximum, and Charlemend's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─as represented by little golden hearts─will increase.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_001_002<tab>Upon reaching a new <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, you will have the opportunity to learn more about Charlemend and his past.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_007_000<tab>In order to deliver an item, you must be its corresponding class and level 70 or above.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_007_001<tab>If you are level 99 or below, you will be awarded experience points instead of the level 100 scrips reward.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_002_000<tab>Should you find yourself unsure as to how to procure a particular item, subcommands and item descriptions can point you in the right direction.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_002_001<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the recipe for the item in question.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_002_002<tab>Likewise, for Disciple of the Land items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Gathering Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the gathering log.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_002_003<tab>For knowledge on fish, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Display Location<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the map of the relevant fishing hole.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_102_003<tab>Furthermore, you may discover that using a metal spinner as a lure will expedite your fishing endeavors.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_002_004<tab>The items sought by Charlemend fall into three categories: crafted items (obtainable by Disciples of the Hand), gathered items (obtainable by Disciples of the Land), and fish. Furthermore, Charlemend deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_003_000<tab>Materials necessary to craft the collectables Charlemend seeks may be purchased from Diana in front of Ser Vaindreau's Grace.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_004_000<tab>The collectability of crafted items is directly related to their quality. Spare no effort in ensuring that the items you craft are of the highest possible quality, and you will be rewarded accordingly.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_004_002<tab>The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Inner Quiet<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> status, granted each time you successfully increase quality, will serve you particularly well.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_004_003<tab>To be deleted.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_004_004<tab>Stack as many of the status as you can, then put the final flourish on your masterpiece with <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Byregot's Blessing<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_004_005<tab>There are a host of other actions that can serve to further enhance the quality of items you craft. Once you've mastered the fundamentals, you are encouraged to experiment with varied approaches until you find your preferred crafting approach.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_005_000<tab>Before gathering a collectable item, you must increase its collectability.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_005_001<tab>One technique miners and botanists may employ to raise collectability is the use of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scrutiny<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scour<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Try executing this combination a few times before gathering the item.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_005_002<tab>Gatherers seeking to procure items with higher collectability must be certain to equip gear with higher <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gathering<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> ratings, as these attributes influence the effectiveness of actions that raise collectability.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_005_003<tab>Of course, these actions cannot be used to their full potential without sufficient <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>GP<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. A healthy balance of all three attributes is essential to make the most of your gathering.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_006_000<tab>The collectability value of fish follows a simple rule─the bigger, the better.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_006_001<tab>Upon arriving at the fishing hole where your desired quarry resides, use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Collect<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> action, then begin fishing.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_006_002<tab>From there, using <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Patience II<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by effective hooking actions will increase your chances of reeling in a big one.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_GUIDE_006_003<tab>Should you still find yourself catching only small fry, try outfitting yourself with better equipment to raise your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_000_000<tab>The items sought by Charlemend fall into three categories: crafted items (obtainable by Disciples of the Hand), gathered items (obtainable by Disciples of the Land), and fish. Furthermore, Charlemend deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_000_008<tab>In order to deliver an item, you must be its corresponding class and level 70 or above.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_000_009<tab>If you are level 99 or below, you will be awarded experience points instead of the level 100 scrips reward.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>Information on how to find individual items may be found in the following manner:

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_000_002<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the relevant recipes.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_000_003<tab>Materials necessary to craft the collectables Charlemend seeks may be purchased from Diana in front of Ser Vaindreau's Grace.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_000_004<tab>For Disciple of the Land items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Gathering Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the gathering log and the recipes in question.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_000_005<tab>For knowledge on fish, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Display Location<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the map of the relevant fishing hole.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_100_005<tab>Furthermore, you may discover that using a metal spinner as a lure will expedite your fishing endeavors.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>The higher an item's collectability, the greater the reward you will earn from Charlemend upon successful delivery.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>To learn more about collectables and how to increase collectability, speak with Charlemend and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Learn about custom deliveries<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>In making your first successful delivery, you have begun to earn Charlemend's trust.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>With each successful delivery, Charlemend will grow more and more satisfied with your efforts. Fill the gauge completely and Charlemend's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will increase, giving you the opportunity to learn more about your new business partner.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>You can make up to six deliveries in a given week. Deliver the items Charlemend needs, and deliver them often to win the trust and praise of your new business partner!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000<tab>You have reached the weekly limit for deliveries. You may begin again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_001_000<tab>Excellent, these necessities will serve our patients well. Cleanliness being of the essence, I will see to disinfecting these ere they are put to use. But first, a little inspection for good measure...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_001_001<tab>From metal receptacles to cloth bandages, medical equipment must be made to exacting standards. Having come from your hands, I expect this will be more than satisfactory, but it would be remiss of me not to perform an inspection. If you'll excuse me...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_001_002<tab>Safety is paramount when it comes to rehabilitation, and any equipment used must be sturdy and durable. Having come from your hands, I expect this will be more than satisfactory, but it would be remiss of me not to perform an inspection. If you'll excuse me...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_001_003<tab>In a snow-swept nation such as ours, nobles and commoners alike are partial to a steaming cup of tea served with sweets. These items will allow us to host an event that our patients will enjoy. Now, if I might take a closer look...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_001_004<tab>Painting provides not only a means of relaxation, but rehabilitation besides. These supplies will allow our patients to enjoy the benefits of exercising their artistry as they continue their journey of healing. Now, if I might take a closer look...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_002_000<tab>Brought us some lye, have you? Excellent. The infirmary ever has need of soap, and this will make a goodly amount of the stuff. Now, if I might take a closer look...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_002_001<tab>From metal receptacles to cloth bandages, medical equipment must be made of quality materials. Having come from your hands, I expect this will be more than satisfactory, but it would be remiss of me not to perform an inspection. If you'll excuse me...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_002_002<tab>Safety is paramount when it comes to rehabilitation, and the materials used in any equipment must be sturdy and durable. Having come from your hands, I expect this will be more than satisfactory, but it would be remiss of me not to perform an inspection. If you'll excuse me...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_002_003<tab>In a snow-swept nation such as ours, nobles and commoners alike are partial to a steaming cup of tea served with sweets. Using this ingredient, we can prepare a toothsome syrup that our patients will enjoy. Now, if I might take a closer look...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_002_004<tab>Painting provides not only a means of relaxation, but rehabilitation besides. With this ingredient, we can prepare colors for our patients to use in their artistic endeavors. Now, if I might take a closer look...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_003_000<tab>Brought us a scallop, have you? Excellent. The infirmary ever has need of soap, and the powder obtained from its shell will make a goodly amount of the stuff. Now, if I might take a closer look...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_003_001<tab>Ah, yes, from this variety of kelp, we can distill an extract with potent disinfecting properties─that is, assuming the specimen is sufficiently lush. Let us take a closer look...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_003_002<tab>Rehabilitation is all too often a painful process, but from this frog's poison, we can concoct a medicine that effectively dulls pain. Now, if I might take a closer look at the critter...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_003_003<tab>I am told that, in the Far East, it is customary to burn incense when drinking tea. Using such delightful seashells as incense burners, we can fill the room with a soothing scent. Now, if I might take a closer look...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_KNOWLEDGE_CHARLEMEND_003_004<tab>Ah, yes, this fish is considered a delicacy even among nobility. As tasty as it is nutritious, it will allow us to prepare meals that nourish the body even as it pleases the palate. Now, if I might take a closer look...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_JUDGEMENT_CHARLEMEND_000_000<tab>Hm, yes, nothing to be desired. You are true to your reputation, my friend.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_JUDGEMENT_CHARLEMEND_000_001<tab>Hm-hm, even to my layman's eyes, 'tis plain the quality is superior. Maelie will surely be pleased.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_JUDGEMENT_CHARLEMEND_000_002<tab>By the Fury, even to my layman's eyes, 'tis plain the quality is transcendent! I cannot show this to Maelie soon enough!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_JUDGEMENT_CHARLEMEND_000_003<tab>Hm, yes, very fine stuff indeed! This will be a high tea to remember, mark my words!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_JUDGEMENT_CHARLEMEND_000_004<tab>Hm, yes, very fine stuff indeed! It will help to bring a touch of joy to our patients' lives!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>Unable to obtain your reward. Your inventory is full.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>To collect your reward, make room in your inventory and speak with Charlemend once more.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_BEFRANKUP_CHARLEMEND_000_000<tab>With this latest contribution, we now have the requisite amount of necessities. You have my gratitude.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_BEFRANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_000<tab>Thanks to you, we now have all the medical supplies we require at present. A moment while I summon Maelie hither.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_BEFRANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_000<tab>We now have enough equipment for our patients' rehabilitation. Next, we must learn how to assist them through the process.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_BEFRANKUP_CHARLEMEND_003_000<tab>Thanks to you, we now have everything we require. 'Tis time to prepare the venue for the high tea. Come, let us go and put smiles on our patients' faces.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_000<tab>Is it true? We have enough daily necessities now?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_001<tab>That we do, and we owe it to our industrious friend.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_002<tab>Wonderful! Now our patients have everything they need! Thank you so much, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_003<tab>So much, indeed... I must confess, I was surprised to see how much is needed simply to provide our patients with a basic level of comfort.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_004<tab>All these things need replacin' too, so we'll need to keep makin' more. Just like we do at the orphanage.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_005<tab>Truly? You make everything you need by yourselves?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_006<tab>Well, sure. Most things anyway. I mean, who else is goin' to do it for us? Same with the cleanin'─we do that ourselves too.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_007<tab>Ooh, I know! Next time, I'll teach you how to clean. Dustin' and moppin' and all that. We have to do these things regularly. After all, cleanliness is next to healthiness!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_008<tab>I should be grateful for your tutelage, child.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_009<tab>Such devotion to her duty...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_001<tab>...So, taking <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s contributions into account, how long will the supplies last?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_002<tab>Um, if we add that to what we already have, that should give us...three weeks!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_003<tab>Correct yet again! Your numbers have improved in leaps and bounds.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_004<tab>That's thanks to your lessons. You make it easy <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> fun to learn.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_005<tab>Oh, and I've learned how to dress a wound as well! Maurilette taught me!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_006<tab>Maelie is truly a fast learner. It doubtless stems from her fervent desire to help others.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_007<tab>While I do not want for the selfsame desire, the old hound that I am, 'tis all I can do to keep up.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_003_000<tab>Have you heard, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Maurilette's goin' to teach us how to help our patients! With their rehabilitation, that is!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_003_001<tab>...What's wrong? You have a stomachache or somethin'?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_003_002<tab>No, no, nothing of the sort. It's just...I can't help but worry whether I will be able to assist our patients appropriately. What if they do not improve, or worse yet, end up suffering more pain?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_003_003<tab>Hmmm... You could try and imagine you're hurtin' in the same places. That way you'd know how they feel and can help them better.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_003_004<tab>Besides, we'll be there too, me and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. So don't worry. Everything will be fine!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_003_005<tab>Yes... Yes, you have the right of it. I shall do as you say, and imagine their pain as mine own. Come, let us have Maurilette instruct us at once!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_000<tab>How're you feelin'? Enjoyin' yourself?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_PATIENT00710_004_001<tab>I am. I must say, I never thought it could be so pleasant at an infirmary. Thank you, Maelie.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_004_002<tab>I daresay the event is a success. We owe it to the two of you for conceiving of it and providing what was required.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_003<tab>Full glad am I to see our patients so enjoying themselves. Long as many of them must stay here, what little additional comfort we can provide goes a long way. And as an unexpected benefit...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_STAFF00710_004_004<tab>You helped with the preparations as well, did you not? Thank you, Ronantain. You've a good heart.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_RONANTAIN_004_005<tab>Well, I scarcely did anything...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_006<tab>...It served to break down the barriers to which my nephew had clung.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_001_100<tab>Allow me to thank you all for replenishing the daily necessities. It shall keep us for a good while.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_001_101<tab>And with Charlemend tutoring Maelie while managing our stores, my fellow nurses and I find our burden greatly lightened. All of which is to say you are doing well.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_001_102<tab>That being the case, I have a mind to task you with replenishing and managing our medical supplies as well. Do you think you will be up to the task?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_103<tab>Yes, Maurilette! Just leave it to us!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_104<tab>You heard that, Charlemend? We're in charge of medical supplies now!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_105<tab>'Tis testament to your dedication. Let us keep up our fine form.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_106<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, there is none we trust more to provide what we need. May we rely upon you once more?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_100<tab>I took the liberty of inspecting our inventory, and I'm pleased to say that all is in good order. The two of you are doing a fine job of managing the medical supplies.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_101<tab>Hehe, that's because Charlemend's been teachin' me my numbers!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_102<tab>I certainly see you teaching Maelie often of late. A more zealous tutor one would be hard-pressed to find.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_103<tab>Yes, well, one might say 'tis a force of habit.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_104<tab>I have a nephew, you see─a boy of an age with Maelie─and I daresay I see him in her.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_105<tab>With my brother passed and firstborn lost, I took him under my wing as my successor, teaching him such knowledge as he needs to one day lead our knights in battle against the dragons.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_106<tab>Yet now that the Dragonsong War has ended, we must dedicate ourselves not to the taking of life, but the bettering of it.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_107<tab>However, not all of our countrymen have embraced change. And as a father figure to my nephew, I felt that I must needs practice that which I preach.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_108<tab>Leading by example, I wished to give him a glimpse of a new Ishgard, one where there is no highborn and lowborn─just fellow Ishgardians striving together for a better tomorrow.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_109<tab>By that, I must confess that I do not have only the interests of the patients in mind. 'Twas wrong of me not to disclose this fact from the first, and I beg your forgiveness.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_110<tab>No apologies are necessary, Charlemend. Whatever your reasons, you've been naught but an asset to the infirmary. You and Maelie both.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_111<tab>Thus do I have a mind to entrust the two of you with even more responsibilities.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_112<tab>Many of our patients have debilitating injuries, and are in need of rehabilitation. I want you to assist them in their efforts. This is an important task, one that requires you to work closely with the patients.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAURILETTE_002_113<tab>Now, rehabilitation demands a variety of sophisticated equipment, such that can only be provided by skilled artisans. To wit, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we must turn to you once more.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_100<tab>Not only did the event unfold smoothly─by participating in it, my nephew has begun to warm to the idea of a new Ishgard. I couldn't have asked for a better outcome.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_101<tab>Going forward, 'tis my intent to host high teas on a regular basis, meaning we will continue to require the relevant supplies. I hope you will keep obliging us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─with those items as well as the usual necessities.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_004_102<tab>Hehe, you really like workin' here, don't you?

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_103<tab>If truth be told, I had not expected to enjoy myself so. I never would have known this were it not for you and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_104<tab>And with matters at home laid to rest, I may continue doing my part here with an easy heart.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_105<tab>I trust that you will continue to be at my side, Maelie─as a fellow aide and mentor both.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_MAELIE_004_106<tab>Oh, you can count on it! It's great fun workin' together, and I learn so much from you as well!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_107<tab>And you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We are indebted to you more than words can well express.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_108<tab>You have done all of us at Ser Vaindreau's Grace a great service, and I pray that you will continue to lend us your expertise.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_109<tab>Speaking of which...there is one other favor I had been meaning to ask of you.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_110<tab>Though I have been disguising myself─leastwise, that was my intent─I have failed to fool a single person.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_LCUT_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_111<tab>As such, I shall shed with disguises, and strive instead to dress in a manner that would better endear myself to citizens and patients both. Whenever you have a spare moment, I would greatly appreciate your insights on outfits.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_000_000<tab>Charlemend is pleased with your efforts. He now considers you an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Aide's Able Associate<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_000_001<tab>Charlemend is delighted with your efforts. He now considers you an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Aide's Avid Assistant<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_000_002<tab>Charlemend is overjoyed with your efforts. He now considers you an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Aide's Ardent Ally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_000_003<tab>Charlemend could not be happier with your efforts. He now considers you an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Aide's Attentive Angel<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_001_001<tab>And yet there is still much work to be done if he is to atone for past negligence and provide a shining example for the future of Ishgard. To that end, Charlemend has a new favor to ask of you...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUPINFO_001_002<tab>Through your efforts, the patients of Ser Vaindreau's Grace have never enjoyed better conditions. It seems, however, that Charlemend has a different sort of favor to ask of you...

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_000_001<tab>The Custom Deliveries list for Charlemend has been updated. To view the new list, speak with Charlemend and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Make a delivery<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_001_001<tab>A new quest continuing the story of Charlemend's efforts at Ser Vaindreau's Grace is now available from Maurilette. Upon its completion, the Custom Deliveries list for Charlemend will be updated.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_002_001<tab>Future requests will be selected at random from all those you have seen thus far, with the list refreshed once a week (Earth time).

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_002_002<tab>You may review the items currently in demand at any time by speaking with Charlemend and selecting <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Make a delivery<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_002_003<tab>Note that art supplies, art supply materials, and fragrant sweetfish will earn you particularly handsome rewards. Whenever they make an appearance, the effort to procure them will be worth your while.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTRANKUP_002_004<tab>Furthermore, Charlemend's appearance may now be altered through the use of glamours.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_MAELIE_001_000<tab>Thanks for bringin' us so much, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_001_001<tab>Indeed. 'Tis in no small part due to your contributions that we budding aides are able to discharge our duties. We are truly grateful.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_000<tab>Thanks so much for always helpin' us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_002_001<tab>With your kind assistance, we are being entrusted with tasks of ever greater import. We hope we can continue to depend on you.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_003_000<tab>I'm pleased to say that our patients have been making excellent progress with their rehabilitation. And in the course of working together, I have managed to strike up a rapport with many of them.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_MAELIE_002_001<tab>Just earlier, Maurilette told us that we're fully fledged aides now! But we won't rest on these laurels, oh no. We'll keep workin' as hard as ever!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_000<tab>Not in a very long time have I had the opportunity to learn so much. It makes me feel like a young man again.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_MAELIE_004_001<tab>Ronantain's been learnin' a lot too. Haven't you, Ronantain?
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_RONANTAIN_004_002<tab>A-Aye, well, I but follow my uncle's example.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_004_003<tab>It does me well to see the younger generation embrace change. After all, 'tis they who shall lead Ishgard unto the future. Not to say that I won't do my part, but I must work hard if I am to keep up with their youthful vigor!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_005_000<tab>Not only has my nephew grown accustomed to assisting here─it pleases me to say he takes to the work with great zeal.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_MAELIE_005_001<tab>We have to wash the bedsheets next! Let's go, Ronantain!
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_RONANTAIN_005_002<tab>A-All right!

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_006_000<tab>I've not forgotten that you are a busy <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I am truly grateful that you should see fit to lend us so much of your assistance, and not only here at the infirmary.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_006_001<tab>Among other things, House Durendaire owes much of her newfound prosperity to you.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_006_002<tab>Your coming and subsequent ending of the Dragonsong War wrought great changes. Changes that many Ishgardians─myself among them─struggled to accept.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_006_003<tab>But I believe I speak for an ever-growing number of my countrymen when I say we appreciate all that you have done, and continue to do, for our nation.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_RANKUP_CHARLEMEND_006_004<tab>On behalf of all Ishgardians, I give you my humblest thanks.

TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_AFTWEEKLY_000_000<tab>You have delivered the weekly maximum of six items to Charlemend. You may begin making deliveries again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_QUEST_CHARLEMEND_000_000<tab>...Hm? As much as battle attire becomes you, perhaps you should don something more suitable for our lesson with Maurilette.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_QUEST_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>In order to undertake the next quest, speak with Maurilette as a Disciple of the Hand or the Land.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_QUEST_CHARLEMEND_000_010<tab>Their pain as mine own, their pain as mine own...
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_QUEST_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>Custom deliveries cannot be made while the quest “Those Who Serve” is in progress. They will become available again once the quest is completed.
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER7_00710_QUEST_CHARLEMEND_000_015<tab>I apologize for my nephew's outburst. He is a good lad, truly.
